# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api import plotly.plotly as py from plotly.graph_objs import * from datetime import datetime x = [ datetime(year=2013, month=10, day=04), datetime(year=2013, month=11, day=05), datetime(year=2013, month=12, day=06) ] data = Data([ Scatter( x=x, y=[1, 3, 6] ) ]) plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='python-datetime')
